qas.question: In 2008, what country had the largest number of elevators?
What country had the second most elevators installed?
How many elevators had China installed since 1949?
What country boasts the worlds largest market for elevators?
How many elevators are in Brazil?

context: As of January 2008, <a0_0>Spain<a0_0/> is the nation with the most elevators installed in the world, with 950,000 elevators installed that run more than one hundred million lifts every day, followed by <a1_0>United States<a1_0/> with 700,000 elevators installed and China with <a2_0>610,000<a2_0/> elevators installed since 1949. In Brazil, it is estimated that there are approximately <a4_0>300,000<a4_0/> elevators currently in operation. The world's largest market for elevators is <a3_0>Italy<a3_0/>, with more than 1,629 million euros of sales and 1,224 million euros of internal market.
